Elements.Name: multiplier
Description: Global multiplier for Pop-In that includes most objects. This is capped to 6 so that things don't break. There is also an internal cap that limits the maximum range of most objects to prevent major bugs.

Elements.Name: stableMode
Description: Only increases the range of certain objects to stay under the Object Limit

Elements.Name: camTrigger
Description: Removes (most) Camera Triggers from the open zones.

Elements.Name: dashPanels
Description: Removes Dash Panels and Rail Boosters from the open zones.

Elements.Name: 2D
Description: Removes all 2D dimensions from the open zones, letting you play as much of the game in 3D as possible.

Elements.Name: dashRings
Description: Removes all dash rings from the open zone. This may make the game unbeatable.

Elements.Name: springHoming
Description: Forces springs to be targeted by homing attacks, this does not affect classic springs.

Elements.Name: refuseFreeze
Description: In most cases, don't freeze the player and let them keep control.

Elements.Name: noHoldMonologue
Description: Doesn't stop the player when Sonic does a monologue.

Elements.Name: showCyloopCollectibles
Description: Unlocks vault keys hidden inside chests without needing to Cyloop them. Gears and Memory Tokens can still be found in chests.

Elements.Name: nightChallengeRemoval
Description: Disables Night Challenges and forces them to be playable at any time.

Elements.Name: shortenedPuzzles
Description: Shortens the light, crane, and pinball puzzles at the end of the first three islands.

Elements.Name: gearCount
Description: How many gears Cyber Space portals require.

Elements.Name: chestTokenNumber
Description: How many Memory Tokens can be found in chests.

Elements.Name: w1r03MemoryTokenMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Memory Token requirements on Kronos

Elements.Name: w2r01MemoryTokenMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Memory Token requirements on Ares

Elements.Name: w3r01MemoryTokenMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Memory Token requirements on Chaos

Elements.Name: w1r04MemoryTokenMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Memory Token requirements on Ouranos

Elements.Name: w1r03KeyRequirementMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Vault Key requirements on Kronos

Elements.Name: w2r01KeyRequirementMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Vault Key requirements on Ares

Elements.Name: w3r01KeyRequirementMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Vault Key requirements on Chaos

Elements.Name: w1r04KeyRequirementMultiplier
Description: Multiplies all Vault Key requirements on Ouranos
1 Gear is required per portal.
No gears are required to enter portals
This uses the default gear values
